titleStmt.title: Annotations for 劉義慶世說新語

publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Zhì reminded him about the accident in the Grand Academy,

sense.def: academy

tls:text.tls:line: He held himself rigidly to the ritual code.

sense.def: ritual-based legal system

tls:text.tls:line: They lectured loud and long on rites and laws,

sense.def: ritual-based legal system

tls:text.tls:line: whereas Biàn Kǔn 壼 always kept himself within the bounds of propriety and law.

sense.def: ritual-based legal system

tls:text.tls:line: to sort out and establish the rites and ceremonies, laws and ordinances.

sense.def: legal injunction; order by authority of the law
(presumably) only N is a case in point, only N is like this

tls:text.tls:line: When he became grand warden of Yùzhāng,

sense.def: governor of a contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:line: The grand warden of Yǐngchuān (Hénán 河 南) had penalized Chén Shí 寔 by shaving his head.

sense.def: governor of a contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:line: You should banish him beyond the sea

sense.def: abroad; distant parts LUNHENG
use an action (to deal with a situation)

tls:text.tls:line: his father was a cow-doctor. [[CHECK MATHER'S PAGE ON THIS.]]

sense.def: a physician for cows

tls:text.tls:line: But Róng accepted none if it.

sense.def: all objects; all objects completely

tls:text.tls:line: as well as the younger members of the Wáng and Péi families, were all assembled.

sense.def: all

seg.line: 于時竺法深、孫興公悉共聽。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 于時竺法深、孫興公悉共聽。
tls:text.tls:line: At the time the monk Zhú Dàoqián 道 潛 and the layman Sūn Chuò 綽 were also present listening.

sense.def: all

tls:text.tls:line: until the hairs had worn off completely

sense.def: all

tls:text.tls:line: were all at the villa of the Prince of Kuàijī (Sīmǎ Yù 司 馬 昱).

sense.def: all

tls:text.tls:line: and from their time onward all writers imitated them.

sense.def: all
